relation: Thanks to the wonders of the M1 Easy Patch, I'm convinced that Pippi has a good shot at defeating this unbeatable boss. I daresay she could do it on her own, even! Why do we have to give her away? Why???
The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain. Yup. This was an experiment in drawing a scene without relying on outlines.
The lineless variety. It might not look like much, but it's just as deadly as the other versions. Be wary of the spores!
The latest in book reading technology in those dark places. Just be sure to tame it first.
Aw, look! Our little Ramblin' Evil Mushroom is in love!
